tls:line.title: Yang Xiong: Philosophy of the Fa yan

tls:text.tls:line: Gazing upon the sage one knows the pettiness of the multitude of other doctrines.

tls:text.tls:line: As for one who abandons the great sage and loves the various philosophers,

“Women have a certain allure. Do books also have this quality?”20 2.5“They do.21 With women, one hates it when paints interfere with theirfeminine graces.22 And with writings, one hates it when overelaboratephrasing sullies or confounds23 the model and measure.”

sense.def: an abstract kind of erotic attractiveness

tls:text.tls:line: “Women have a certain allure. Do books also have this quality?”20 2.5“They do.21 With women, one hates it when paints interfere with theirfeminine graces.22 And with writings, one hates it when overelaboratephrasing sullies or confounds23 the model and measure.”

sense.def: female beauty; male or female good looks; sex; sexy looks; female charms

tls:text.tls:line: With women, one hates it when paints interfere with theirfeminine graces.22

but the substance would bewrong.”43“May I inquire about substance?”“A sheep in wolf ’s clothing will be delighted when it spies some grass,and it will shake with terror when it sees a fox, since it will have forgottenall about the pelt it wears.”44“The sage is as distinct as the tiger, with patterns bold and brilliant!The noble man is as distinct as a leopard, with patterns fine and elegant.The rhetorician is like the fox, its patterns dense and luxuriant enough toprovide cover.45 A single change of the fox and it can become a leopard,and a single change of the leopard and it can become a tiger!”46

sense.def: essence DC: 性質；本質。《論語·衛靈公》："君子義以為質，禮以行之。"《史記·樂書》："中正無邪，禮之質也；莊敬恭順，禮之制也。" 張守節 正義："質，本也。" 王西彥 《古屋》第五部二："要緊的不是名詞，而是實質。"
essence DC: 性質；本質。《論語·衛靈公》："君子義以為質，禮以行之。"《史記·樂書》："中正無邪，禮之質也；莊敬恭順，禮之制也。" 張守節 正義："質，本也。" 王西彥 《古屋》第五部二："要緊的不是名詞，而是實質。"
essence; inner substantial reality DC: 性質；本質。《論語·衛靈公》："君子義以為質，禮以行之。"《史記·樂書》："中正無邪，禮之質也；莊敬恭順，禮之制也。" 張守節 正義："質，本也。" 王西彥 《古屋》第五部二："要緊的不是名詞，而是實質。"

with patterns fine and elegant.

so in what sense is it both brilliantly clear and easy'?"
